General.Name: Tadmax Resources Berhad
General.Description: Maxim Global Berhad engages in the property development, agriculture development, and industrial supply businesses in Malaysia. The company operates through Property Development & Construction; Timber & Oil Palm Plantation; and Investment Holding & Others segments. It also develops and sells affordable apartments to low and middle income earners; owns approximately 80,000 hectares of land for the development of oil palm plantation in Papua Province, Republic of Indonesia; and produces and supplies ready-mixed concrete and building materials. In addition, the company operates as a general contractor; and trades in palm oil and building materials. Maxim Global Berhad was incorporated in 1968 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
